title: "Artificial Intelligence-based smartphone app for characterizing stool form"
excerpt: "In a recent study published in the American Journal of Gastroenterology, researchers at Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in the United States evaluated an artificial intelligence (AI)-based smartphone application (app) trained to assess a patient's stool characteristics."
